db:para.db:emphasis: This type is deprecated since 6.5. We strongly advise against using it in new code.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Use ExtendedSceneEnvironment, MultiEffect, or user-defined effects via the Effect type instead.

db:warning.db:para: All pre-made standalone effects in QtQuick3D.Effects are considered deprecated starting with Qt 6.5. Applications are advised to use ExtendedSceneEnvironment or MultiEffect instead, when applicable, or alternatively provide their own custom post-processing effect via the Effect type.

db:section.db:para: Scatters the pixels in a scene, creating a blurry or smeared appearance. Without changing the color of each individual pixel, the Scatter effect redistributes the pixels randomly, but in the same general area as their original positions.

db:section.db:title: amount : real
db:section.db:para: Determines how much to scatter. The range is [0...127]. The default value is 10.

db:section.db:title: direction : int
db:section.db:para: The direction in which to scatter the pixels. Set to 0 for both horizontal and vertical, 1 for horizontal, and 2 for vertical. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: noiseSample : TextureInput
db:section.db:para: The scatter noise texture map. The default is a Texture with source "maps/brushnoise.png".

db:section.db:title: randomize : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies whether the scattering pattern changes for each frame. The default value is true.
